runStepTillFail

TestStepStatus runStepTillFail(java.lang.String testStepName, Delay delay, Loops loops)
brief:
Will run specific test step till it fails in a loop
Parameters:
testStepName - Test step name
delay - Delay in milliseconds that will be applied after each run
loops - number of loops
Returns:
TestStepStatus object

brief:
Will run specific test step till it pass in a loop

loops - number of loops
